attributes.action: make it law that all parents have to have contact with there kids
attributes.additional_details: its not fare when a parent uses there kids as weapons or leavage to gain a upper hand on the other parent and uses lies to get court orders against the other parent and by using social services to do the same ..social services should never be involved in contact and have overal power or control over families unless the pyisical evidence is 100% there and undeniable as such interference can and does destroy families
attributes.background: should make it law that all parents have to have contact with there kids unless they give up that right..parental responsiblity should always over rule social services and court orders unless the kid lives and wellbeing is at risk of severe harm and proven to be with actual evidence

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309849
